verses.verse: And the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was <S%H3515>sore<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> they had eaten <S%H3615>up<s%> <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7668>corn<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H935>brought<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4714><s%> their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, Go <S%H7725>again,<s%> <S%H7666>buy<s%> us a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H400>food.<s%>

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H376>man<s%> did solemnly <S%H5749>protest<s%> <S%H5749><s%> unto us, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H1115>except<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> be <S%H854>with<s%> you.
If <S%H518><s%> thou <S%H3426>wilt<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H853><s%> our <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> us, we will go <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H7666>buy<s%> thee food: <S%H400><s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> thou wilt <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> him, we will <S%H3808>not<s%> go <S%H3381>down:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> us, Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H1115>except<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> be <S%H854>with<s%> you.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>Wherefore<s%> dealt ye so <S%H7489>ill<s%> with me, as to <S%H5046>tell<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> whether ye had <S%H5750>yet<s%> a <S%H251>brother?<s%>

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H376>man<s%> asked us <S%H7592>straitly<s%> <S%H7592><s%> of our state, and of our <S%H4138>kindred,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Is your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H2416>alive?<s%> <S%H3426>have<s%> ye another <S%H251>brother?<s%> and we <S%H5046>told<s%> him according <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H6310>tenor<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words:<s%> could we certainly <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3045><s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> he would <S%H559>say,<s%> Bring your brother <S%H3381>down?<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H251><s%>

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H7971>Send<s%> the <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> me, and we will <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H1980>go;<s%> that we may <S%H2421>live,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H587>we,<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> our little <S%H2945>ones.<s%>

I <S%H595><s%> will be <S%H6148>surety<s%> for him; of my <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> shalt thou <S%H1245>require<s%> him: <S%H518>if<s%> I <S%H935>bring<s%> him <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, and <S%H3322>set<s%> him <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, then let me bear the <S%H2398>blame<s%> <S%H3605>forever:<s%> <S%H3117><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3884>except<s%> we had <S%H4102>lingered,<s%> <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> we had <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> second <S%H6471>time.<s%>

And their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H518>If<s%> it must be <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H645>now,<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2063>this;<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> of the best <S%H4480>fruits<s%> <S%H2173><s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> in your <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and carry <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> a <S%H4503>present,<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H6875>balm,<s%> and a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H1706>honey,<s%> <S%H5219>spices,<s%> and <S%H3910>myrrh,<s%> <S%H992>nuts,<s%> and almonds: <S%H8247><s%>

And <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4932>double<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was brought <S%H7725>again<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of your <S%H572>sacks,<s%> carry it <S%H7725>again<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> <S%H194>peradventure<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> was an oversight: <S%H4870><s%>
Take <S%H3947><s%> also your <S%H251>brother,<s%> and <S%H6965>arise,<s%> go <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the man: <S%H376><s%>

And <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H7356>mercy<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H376>man,<s%> that he may send <S%H7971>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%> <S%H834>If<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> be <S%H7921>bereaved<s%> of my children, I am <S%H7921>bereaved.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>that<s%> <S%H4503>present,<s%> and they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4932>double<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin;<s%> and rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%>

And when <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them, he <S%H559>said<s%> to the ruler <S%H834>of<s%> <S%H5921><s%> his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H935>Bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> these <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H1004>home,<s%> and <S%H2873>slay,<s%> <S%H2874><s%> and make <S%H3559>ready;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> these <S%H376>men<s%> shall <S%H398>dine<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> me at <S%H6672>noon.<s%>

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>bade;<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> into <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> were <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they were <S%H935>brought<s%> into <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H1004>house;<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> Because <S%H5921>of<s%> <S%H1697><s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H7725>returned<s%> in our <S%H572>sacks<s%> at the first <S%H8462>time<s%> are <S%H587>we<s%> brought <S%H935>in;<s%> that he may seek <S%H1556>occasion<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us, and <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> us, and <S%H3947>take<s%> us for <S%H5650>bondmen,<s%> and our <S%H2543>asses.<s%>

And they came <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H376>steward<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and they <S%H1696>communed<s%> <S%H413>with<s%> him at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%>
And <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H994>O<s%> <S%H113>sir,<s%> we came indeed <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H3381><s%> at the first <S%H8462>time<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> food: <S%H400><s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> we <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4411>inn,<s%> that we <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H853><s%> our <S%H572>sacks,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> was in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of his <S%H572>sack,<s%> our <S%H3701>money<s%> in full <S%H4948>weight:<s%> and we have brought it <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H853><s%> in our <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> have we brought <S%H3381>down<s%> in our <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food:<s%> we <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3045>tell<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> our <S%H3701>money<s%> in our <S%H572>sacks.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7965>Peace<s%> be to you, <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H408>not:<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> you <S%H4301>treasure<s%> in your <S%H572>sacks:<s%> I <S%H935>had<s%> your <S%H3701>money.<s%> And he brought Simeon <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8095><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> into <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H4325>water,<s%> and they <S%H7364>washed<s%> their <S%H7272>feet;<s%> and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> their <S%H2543>asses<s%> <S%H4554>provender.<s%>

And they made <S%H3559>ready<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4503>present<s%> <S%H5704>against<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> at <S%H6672>noon:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> they should <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And when <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H1004>home,<s%> they <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> the <S%H4503>present<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was in their <S%H3027>hand<s%> into the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and bowed <S%H7812>themselves<s%> to him to the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And he <S%H7592>asked<s%> them of their <S%H7965>welfare,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Is your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7965>well,<s%> the old <S%H2205>man<s%> of <S%H834>whom<s%> ye <S%H559>spoke?<s%> Is he <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H2416>alive?<s%>

And they <S%H559>answered,<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> our <S%H1>father<s%> is in good <S%H7965>health,<s%> he is <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H2416>alive.<s%> And they bowed down their <S%H6915>heads,<s%> and made <S%H7812>obeisance.<s%>

And he lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Is <S%H2088>this<s%> your <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> of <S%H834>whom<s%> ye <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me? And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> unto thee, my <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> made <S%H4116>haste;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> his <S%H7356>bowels<s%> did <S%H3648>yearn<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> his <S%H251>brother:<s%> and he <S%H1245>sought<s%> where to <S%H1058>weep;<s%> and he entered <S%H935>into<s%> his <S%H2315>chamber,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>
And he <S%H7364>washed<s%> his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out,<s%> and refrained <S%H662>himself,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Set <S%H7760>on<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%>

And they set <S%H7760>on<s%> for him by <S%H905>himself,<s%> and for them by <S%H905>themselves,<s%> and for the <S%H4713>Egyptians,<s%> which did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him, by <S%H905>themselves:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%> <S%H3201>might<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H5680>Hebrews;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

And they <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> according to his <S%H1062>birthright,<s%> and the <S%H6810>youngest<s%> according to his <S%H6812>youth:<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H8539>marveled<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> <S%H7453>another.<s%>

And he <S%H5375>took<s%> and sent <S%H4864>messes<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him: but <S%H1144>Benjamin's<s%> <S%H4864>mess<s%> was five times so much <S%H7235>as<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4864><s%> <S%H2568><s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> of theirs. And they <S%H8354>drank,<s%> and were <S%H7937>merry<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him.
